title: No Man's Sky Native on Apple Silicon! Testing on Macbook Air M2 and M1 Max Macbook Pro
description:
Buy one on Amazon: http://lon.tv/l1pxy (compensated affiliate link) - No Man's Sky has been ported natively to Apple Silicon, giving us a window into how Apple's processors can perform running popular PC games. See more Apple Silicon videos: http://lon.tv/m1 and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

Find me on No Man's Sky: https://lon.tv/lonville

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:29 - Macbook Air M2 : Standard Settings
03:16 - Macbook Air M2: High Settings
05:21 - Macbook Pro 14 with M1 Max - High Settings
06:41 - Macbook Pro 14 with M1 Max - Ultra Settings
07:41 - Does Multiplayer work?
08:44 - Apple's Gaming Plans
10:29 - Benchmarks
12:31 - Conclusion & More About No Man's Sky
